attributes.action: back a nationwide advertising campaign reminding drivers the importance of lane discipline and using indicators
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An increasing number of drivers on the road fail to either use indicators when changing lanes or turning, or stay within the boundry of a lane, crossing the white line onto the other side of the road when going round a corner. 

Both issues can create dangerous situations. 

The aim of this petition is to ask the government to back an advertising campaign aimed at reminding people the importance of lane discipline and usage of indicators to make driving on our roads safer.
